mapper.select: select count(1) as checkNum from inv_loc where item_id = #{itemId} and (qty_rep_in > 0 or qty_rep_out > 0)

select a.path,b.item_id,b.item_code,b.item_name,c.lot01,a.photo_id,a.lot_id from photos a inner join bas_item b on a.item_id = b.item_id inner join bas_lot_att c on c.lot_id = a.lot_id and a.item_id = c.item_id where a.lot_id = #{lot_id} and a.item_id = #{item_id}
select a.* from bas_lot_att a inner join bas_item b on a.item_id = b.item_id where a.item_id = #{item_id}

select ro.rule_out_id,ro.name as rule_out_name,rt.rule_turnover_id,rt.name as rule_turnover_name, ra.rule_alloc_id,ra.rule_alloc_name as rule_alloc_name,rp.rule_putaway_id,rp.name as rule_putaway_name from bas_item a left join rule_apply b on b.match_id = a.item_id and b.rule_type = 4 left join rule_out ro on ro.rule_out_id = b.rule_id left join rule_apply c on c.match_id = a.item_id and c.rule_type = 5 left join rule_turnover rt on rt.rule_turnover_id = c.rule_id left join rule_apply d on d.match_id = a.item_id and d.rule_type = 6 left join rule_alloc ra on ra.rule_alloc_id = d.rule_id left join rule_apply e on e.match_id = a.item_id and e.rule_type = 1 left join rule_putaway rp on rp.rule_putaway_id = e.rule_id where a.item_id = #{item_id}

select c.package_unit,c.package_meas,b.barcode as xiaobz_barcode,d.barcode as zhongbz_barcode,c.barcode as dabz_barcode, 1 as tiji_coefficient,c.length,c.width,c.high as height,c.volume as tiji,c.weight as weight,floor(e.package_meas/c.package_meas) as biaoztp_num, d.package_meas as zhongbz,c.package_unit as baoz_danw,c.package_meas as baoz_num,c.package_meas as box_package_meas from bas_item a left join bas_package_items b on a.item_id = b.item_id and b.package_level = 1 left join bas_package_items c on a.item_id = c.item_id and c.package_level = 3 left join bas_package_items d on a.item_id = d.item_id and d.package_level = 2 left join bas_package_items e on a.item_id = e.item_id and e.package_level = 4 where a.item_id = #{item_id}

SELECT a.*,b.owner_name FROM bas_item a left join bas_owner b on a.owner_id = b.owner_id
